item.description:
CT Campaign for Liberty is sponsoring a meeting entitled "Follow the Yellow Brick Road".

Keynote Topic: All About Gold & Silver, Are They Good Investments and Preservation of Wealth in Any Economy.
Jim Azzola is speaking also, and possibly Walter Reddy, Committees of Safety.

This is the second in a series of "How to Meetings", the 3rd of which is about long term food storage and bartering. The first was Firearms Safety and Defense. Do you see the pattern?

Tanya Bachand, CT Tea Party, is the moderator for the meet & greet.

Place: Holiday Inn 201 Washington Avenue, North Haven, CT 06473, 203-239-6700
I'll see you on Saturday the 6th.

barbara g.
item.name: Peter Schiff Keynote Speaker Followed by a Meet and Greet
